doc:
Bert Freed https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Bert_Freed 0 Bert Freed (November 3, 1919 – August 2, 1994) was an American character actor, voice-over actor, and the first actor to portray Detective Columbo. Bert_Freed ( November_3_,_1919 – August_2_,_1994 ) was an_American_character_actor , voice-over_actor , and the_first_actor to_portray Detective_Columbo .
